Container.Name: qbit_manage
Container.Overview: qbit_manage is a tool to manage your qBittorrent instance. It offers a range of features to automate your torrenting workflow, including: - **Category and Tag Management:** Automatically update categories based on save paths and add tags based on tracker URLs. - **Torrent Cleanup:** Remove unregistered torrents, orphaned files, and torrents without hardlinks. - **Share Limits:** Apply advanced share limits based on torrent groups, tags, and categories. - **Health Checks:** Recheck paused torrents and tag torrents with tracker errors. - **Scheduler:** Run tasks on a schedule or on-demand. - **Web UI:** A modern web interface to configure and manage qbit_manage, and trigger commands manually.

Config.Name: Root_Dir
Config.Description: Container Path: /Same/path/as/qbittorrent/downloads/

Config.Name: QBT_CONFIG
Config.Description: This is used if you want to use a different name for your config.yml. Example: tv.yml

Config.Name: QBT_LOGFILE
Config.Description: This is used if you want to use a different name for your log file. Example: tv.log

Config.Name: QBT_RUN
Config.Description: Run without the scheduler. Script will exit after completion.

Config.Name: QBT_SCHEDULE
Config.Description: Schedule to run every x minutes. (Default set to 30)

Config.Name: QBT_WEB_SERVER
Config.Description: Set to true to enable web API and web UI

Config.Name: QBT_PORT
Config.Description: Web API port (default: 8080)

Config.Name: QBT_RECHECK
Config.Description: Recheck paused torrents sorted by lowest size. Resume if Completed.

Config.Name: QBT_CAT_UPDATE
Config.Description: Use this if you would like to update your categories.

Config.Name: QBT_TAG_UPDATE
Config.Description: Use this if you would like to update your tags. (Only adds tags to untagged torrents)

Config.Name: QBT_TAG_TRACKER_ERROR
Config.Description: Use this if you would like to tag torrents that do not have a working tracker.

Config.Name: QBT_SHARE_LIMITS
Config.Description: Use this to help apply and manage your torrent share limits based on your tags/categories.

Config.Name: QBT_REM_UNREGISTERED
Config.Description: Use this if you would like to remove unregistered torrents. (It will the delete data & torrent if it is not being cross-seeded, otherwise it will just remove the torrent without deleting data)

Config.Name: QBT_REM_ORPHANED
Config.Description: Use this if you would like to remove orphaned files from your root_dir directory that are not referenced by any torrents. It will scan your root_dir directory and compare it with what is in qBittorrent. Any data not referenced in qBittorrent will be moved into /data/torrents/orphaned_data folder for you to review/delete.

Config.Name: QBT_TAG_NOHARDLINKS
Config.Description: Use this to tag any torrents that do not have any hard links associated with any of the files. This is useful for those that use Sonarr/Radarr that hard links your media files with the torrents for seeding. When files get upgraded they no longer become linked with your media therefore will be tagged with a new tag noHL. You can then safely delete/remove these torrents to free up any extra space that is not being used by your media folder.

Config.Name: QBT_SKIP_CLEANUP
Config.Description: Use this to skip cleaning up Recycle Bin/Orphaned directory.

Config.Name: QBT_DRY_RUN
Config.Description: If you would like to see what is gonna happen but not actually move/delete or tag/categorize anything.

Config.Name: Appdata Config Path
Config.Description: Container Path: /config

Config.Name: QBT_LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Change the ouput log level.

Config.Name: QBT_DIVIDER
Config.Description: Character that divides the sections (Default: '=')

Config.Name: QBT_WIDTH
Config.Description: Screen Width (Default: 100)
